definitions.definition: Something that is given away or handed out for free .
examples: The T-shirt was a giveaway from the company that sells the software.

definitions.definition: An event at which things are given away for free.
The act of giving something away for free.
An indicator that makes something obvious or apparent .
examples: The frosting in his beard was a giveaway that he had been munching the cake.

main_definition: Something that is given away or handed out for free .
secondary_definitions: An event at which things are given away for free.
The act of giving something away for free.
An indicator that makes something obvious or apparent .
